column4: Oct. 5 – Prime Minister Hun Sen decided to cancel the creations of two new provinces
column5: addressing on Friday at the commemoration of World Teachers’ Day 2018
column6: held in Phnom Penh.------The reason was a few officials challenged one another to get leadership positions in the new provinces which has yet created.------The government announced late August to form two new provinces – one divided from Kandal province
column7: and another one divided from Mondulkiri’s Koh Nhek district and Rattanakiri’s Lumphat

column14: the Kingdom of Cambodia has 24 provinces and the Capital City is Phnom Penh.------
